name: Abu
flavor_text:
“Someday, Abu, things are gonna change. We'll be
rich, live in a palace, and never have any problems
at all.”
—Aladdin

name: Aladdin
flavor_text:
“Oh ho! So the street rat found a sword and a
backbone!”
—Razoul

name: Aladdin
text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Aladdin.)
DARING EXPLOIT During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you gain 2 lore and each opponent loses 2 lore.

name: Aladdin
text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
flavor_text:
Fabulously wealthy. Practically untouchable.
Genuinely inauthentic.

name: Aladdin
text: IMPROVISE When you play this character, each opponent loses 1 lore.
flavor_text:
It can be hard to tell the difference between a
diamond in the rough and someone who's just,
well, rough.

name: Anna
text: LOVING HEART When you play this character, if you have a character named Elsa in play, choose an opposing character. The chosen character doesn't ready at the start of their next turn.
flavor_text: “Two sisters, one mind.”

name: Archimedes
flavor_text:
“Flying is not merely some crude, mechanical
process. It is a delicate art. Purely aesthetic.
Poetry of motion. And the best way to learn it is
to do it!”

name: Ariel
text: VOICELESS This character can't {E} to sing songs.

name: Ariel
text:
Singer 5 (This character counts as cost 5 to sing songs.)
MUSICAL DEBUT When you play this character, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal a song card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Ariel
text: LOOK AT THIS STUFF Whenever you play an item, you may ready this character.
flavor_text: “You want thingamabobs? I got twenty.”

name: Aurora
text: DISARMING BEAUTY When you play this character, chosen character gets -2 {S} this turn.
flavor_text:
“There was something strange about that voice.
Too beautiful to be real...”
—Prince Phillip

name: Aurora
text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Aurora.)
PROTECTIVE EMBRACE Your other characters gain Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)
flavor_text: As the princess slumbered, her power awoke.

name: Aurora
flavor_text:
“They say if you dream a thing more than once,
it's sure to come true!”

name: A Whole New World
text: (A character with cost 5 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.) Each player discards their hand and draws 7 cards.
flavor_text: Shining, shimmering, splendid...

name: Beast
text: BREAK When you play this character, you may banish chosen item.
flavor_text: “She'll never see me as anything...but a monster.”

name: Beast
text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
ROAR When you play this character, exert all opposing damaged characters.
flavor_text: “I'll take on all of you if I have to!”

name: Beast’s Mirror
text: SHOW ME {E}, 3 {I} — If you have no cards in your hand, draw a card.
flavor_text:
Ashamed of his monstrous form, the Beast concealed
himself inside his castle, with a magic mirror as his only
window to the outside world.

name: Befuddle
text: Return a character or item with cost 2 or less to their player's hand.
flavor_text: Never be afraid to have your mind boggled now and then.

name: Belle
text: TINKER Whenever this character quests, you pay 1 {I} less for the next item you play this turn.
flavor_text:
A little ingenuity and a lot of heart will take you far
in this world.

name: Belle
text:
READ A BOOK During your turn, you may put an additional card from your hand into your inkwell facedown.
MY FAVORITE PART! While you have 10 or more cards in your inkwell, this character gets +4 {L}.
flavor_text:
“Far-off places, daring sword fights, magic spells, a prince
in disguise...”

name: Be Our Guest
text: (A character with cost 2 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.) Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal a character card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Be Prepared
text:
(A character with cost 7 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Banish all characters.
flavor_text: Our teeth and ambitions are bared!

name: Break
text: Banish chosen item.
flavor_text: No one throws a tantrum like a beast.

name: Captain
flavor_text:
“Barking signal. It's an alert. Report to the Colonel
at once!”

name: Captain Hook
text: DOUBLE THE POWDER! When you play this character, you may return an action card named Fire the Cannons! from your discard to your hand.
flavor_text:
“A pretty sight, Mr. Smee. We'll pot 'em like sitting
ducks.”

name: Captain Hook
text: Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2 {S}.)
flavor_text: He loves to make light of a foe's predicament.

name: Captain Hook
text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
YOU COWARD! While this character is exerted, opposing characters with Evasive gain Reckless. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)
flavor_text: “You wouldn't dare fight old Hook man-to-man!”

name: Captain Hook
text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Captain Hook.)
Challenger +3 (While challenging, this character gets +3 {S}.)
STOLEN DUST Characters with cost 3 or less can't challenge this character.

name: Cerberus
flavor_text:
Always vigilant. Always fierce. Always fighting over
the ball.

name: Cheshire Cat
text: LOSE SOMETHING? When this character is challenged and banished, banish the challenging character.
flavor_text: “You may have noticed that I'm not all there myself.”

name: Chief Tui
text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
flavor_text:
“You can always rely on the strength of those who
love you.”

name: Cinderella
text:
Singer 5 (This character counts as cost 5 to sing songs.)
A WONDERFUL DREAM {E} — Remove up to 3 damage from chosen Princess character.

name: Coconut Basket
text: CONSIDER THE COCONUT Whenever you play a character, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.
flavor_text:
The coconut is a versatile gift from the gods, used to make
nearly everything—including baskets to carry more coconuts.

name: Control Your Temper!
text: Chosen character gets -2 {S} this turn.

name: Cruella De Vil
text: YOU'LL BE SORRY! When this character is challenged and banished, you may return chosen character to their player's hand.
flavor_text: When she stops by, misery is company.

name: Cut to the Chase
text: Chosen character gains Rush this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)
flavor_text: “Surprise!”

name: Develop Your Brain
text: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the other on the bottom of the deck.
flavor_text:
“Knowledge, wisdom—there's the real power!”
—Merlin

name: Dinglehopper
text: STRAIGHTEN HAIR {E} — Remove up to 1 damage from chosen character.
flavor_text: Enjoy the finest of human hairstyles!

name: Do It Again!
text: Return an action card from your discard to your hand.
flavor_text:
“...Then scrub the terrace, sweep the halls and the
stairs, clean the chimneys. And of course there's the
mending, and the sewing, and the laundry...”
—Lady Tremaine

name: Donald Duck
flavor_text: “Who you callin’ boisterous, buster?”

name: Donald Duck
text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
STAY ALERT! During your turn, your Musketeer characters gain Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

name: Donald Duck
text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
flavor_text: Walk smarter, not harder.

name: Dragon Fire
text: Banish chosen character.
flavor_text: Rare is the hero who can withstand a dragon's wrath.

name: Dr. Facilier
text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Dr. Facilier.)
INTO THE SHADOWS Whenever one of your other characters is banished in a challenge, you may return that card to your hand.

name: Dr. Facilier
text: Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2 {S}.)
flavor_text: “Enchantée. A tip of the hat from Dr. Facilier.”

name: Dr. Facilier
text: DREAMS MADE REAL Whenever you play a song, you may look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one on the top of your deck and the other on the bottom.

name: Dr. Facilier’s Cards
text: THE CARDS WILL TELL {E} — You pay 1 {I} less for the next action you play this turn.
flavor_text:
“Take a little trip into your future with me!”
—Dr. Facilier

name: Duke of Weselton
flavor_text:
“Sorcery! I knew there was something dubious
going on here.”

name: Elsa
text: THAT'S NO BLIZZARD Whenever you play a character named Anna, ready this character. This character can't quest for the rest of this turn.
flavor_text:
“My sister has always been there for me. I need to
be there for her.”

name: Elsa
flavor_text: “I never knew what I was capable of.”

name: Elsa
text: FREEZE {E} — Exert chosen opposing character.
flavor_text:
Recreated by magical ink, Elsa found herself in
an entirely new world. Fortunately, ice works the
same way everywhere.

name: Elsa
text:
Shift 6 (You may pay 6 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Elsa.)
DEEP FREEZE When you play this character, exert up to 2 chosen characters. They can't ready at the start of their next turn.
flavor_text: Ice is stronger than you may think.

name: Eye of the Fates
text: SEE THE FUTURE {E} — Chosen character gets +1 {L} this turn.
flavor_text:
You can change the future once you know what you're
looking at.

name: Fan the Flames
text: Ready chosen character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.
flavor_text: Pretty words can move a crowd, but so can ugly ones.

name: Fire the Cannons!
text: Deal 2 damage to chosen character.
flavor_text:
Captain Hook: “Double the powder and shorten the
fuse!”
Mr. Smee: “Shorten the powder and double the fuse!”

name: Fishbone Quill
text: GO AHEAD AND SIGN {E} — Put any card from your hand into your inkwell facedown.
flavor_text:
“If you want to cross the bridge, my sweet, you've got
to pay the toll.”
—Ursula

name: Flotsam
text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
DEXTEROUS LUNGE Your characters named Jetsam gain Rush.
flavor_text: “We know someone who can help you...for a price.”

name: Flounder
flavor_text:
“Excitement...adventure...danger lurking
around every cor- AAAAAGGH!”

name: Flynn Rider
text: HERE COMES THE SMOLDER Whenever this character is challenged, the challenging player chooses and discards a card.
flavor_text:
“I didn't want to have to do this, but you leave me
no choice....”

name: Freeze
text: Exert chosen opposing character.
flavor_text: It's time for you to chill.

name: Friends on the Other Side
text: (A character with cost 3 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.) Draw 2 cards.
flavor_text:
The cards, the cards
the cards will tell...

name: Frying Pan
text: CLANG! Banish this item — Chosen character can't challenge during their next turn.
flavor_text:
It's a fine piece of cookware, but as a weapon it's truly
stunning.

name: Gantu
text: UNDER ARREST Characters with cost 2 or less can't challenge your characters.
flavor_text: “Relax, enjoy the trip...and don't get any ideas!”

name: Gaston
text: Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)
flavor_text: It's not arrogance when you really are the best.

name: Genie
text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
DISAPPEAR When you play this character, you may return chosen character to their player's hand.
flavor_text:
“Can your friends go ‘Abracadabra, let 'er rip’ and then
make the sucker disappear?”

name: Genie
text:
Shift 6 (You may pay 6 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Genie.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
PHENOMENAL COSMIC POWER! Whenever this character quests, you may play an action with cost 5 or less for free.

name: Genie
flavor_text:
“You can wish for nearly anything! Do you want
the short version, or should I give you the whole
song and dance?”

name: Goofy
text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
flavor_text:
Sometimes you gotta give it the ol’ jump and
hyuck.

name: Goofy
text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
AND TWO FOR TEA! When you play this character, you may remove up to 2 damage from each of your Musketeer characters.
flavor_text: “En gawrsh!”

name: Goons
flavor_text:
They may be useless, but they came with the
castle.

name: Grab Your Sword
text:
(A character with cost 5 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Deal 2 damage to each opposing character.
flavor_text:
We don't like
What we don't understand
In fact, it scares us

name: Gramma Tala
text: I WILL BE WITH YOU When this character is banished, you may put this card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavor_text:
Moana: “Is there something you want to tell me?”
Gramma Tala: “Is there something you want to
hear?”

name: Hades
text: IS THERE A DOWNSIDE TO THIS? When you play this character, you may put chosen opposing character into their player's inkwell facedown.
flavor_text:
“He's gotta have a weakness, because everybody's
got a weakness.”

name: Hades
text:
Shift 6 (You may pay 6 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Hades.)
SINISTER PLOT This character gets +1 {L} for each other Villain character you have in play.
flavor_text: “Oh hey. I'm gonna need new business cards.”

name: Hades
text: WELL OF SOULS When you play this character, return a character card from your discard to your hand.
flavor_text:
“Production is up, costs are down, the rivers are
full. Time to talk expansion.”

name: Hakuna Matata
text: (A character with cost 4 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.) Remove up to 3 damage from each of your characters.
flavor_text: What a wonderful phrase!

name: Hans
flavor_text:
“Rules are like older siblings. All they do is get in
the way.”

name: Hans
text: STAGE A LITTLE ACCIDENT Whenever this character quests, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character.
flavor_text: Tired of being last, he decided to cut the line.

name: Healing Glow
text: Remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.
flavor_text:
“Don't freak out!”
—Rapunzel

name: HeiHei
text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
flavor_text:
“Sometimes, our strengths lie beneath the surface.
Far beneath, in some cases....”
—Moana

name: Hercules
text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
flavor_text: “You gotta admit, that was pretty heroic.”

name: He's Got a Sword!
text: Chosen character gets +2 {S} this turn.
flavor_text:
“We've all got swords!”
—Razoul

name: Horace
flavor_text: “Well, they ain't in here, Jasper.”

name: Iago
text: YOU GOT A PROBLEM? {E} — Chosen character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

name: If it’s Not Baroque
text: Return an item card from your discard to your hand.
flavor_text: “...Don't fix it.”

name: Jafar
text: HIDDEN WONDERS This character gets +1 {S} for each card in your hand.
flavor_text: There's more than one way to bury secrets.

name: Jafar
text: Challenger +3 (While challenging, this character gets +3 {S}.)
flavor_text:
“Enough skulking about. It's time to show that
sniveling sultan what a sorcerer can do.”

name: Jasmine
flavor_text:
“Try to understand. I've never done a thing on my
own. I've never had any real friends.... I've never
even been outside the palace walls.”

name: Jasmine
text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Jasmine.)
CARETAKER When you play this character and whenever she quests, you may remove up to 2 damage from each of your characters.

name: Jasper
text: PUPPYNAPPING Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character can't quest during their next turn.
flavor_text:
“Now, look here, Horace, I warned you about
thinkin’.”

name: Jetsam
text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
SINISTER SLITHER Your characters named Flotsam gain Evasive.
flavor_text: “We can help you get anything you want....”

name: John Silver
text: PICK YOUR FIGHTS When you play this character and whenever he quests, chosen opposing character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)
flavor_text: “Don't be too put off by this...hunk of hardware.”

name: Jumba Jookiba
flavor_text:
“Created something? Ha! But that would be
irresponsible and unethical. I would never, ever...
make more than one.”

name: Just in Time
text: You may play a character with cost 5 or less for free.
flavor_text:
The best heroes always arrive at the perfect moment—
whether they know it or not.

name: Kristoff
flavor_text:
Kristoff: “You want to talk about a supply and demand
problem? I sell ice for a living.”
Anna: “Ooh, that's a rough business to be in right now. I
mean, that is really—ah, mm. That's unfortunate.”

name: Kronk
flavor_text: “Oh yeah. It's all coming together!”

name: Kuzco
text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
NO TOUCHY! When this character is challenged and banished, you may banish the challenging character.
flavor_text:
“l asked for emerald and that is clearly jade! What is wrong
with you people?”

name: Lady Tremaine
text: DO IT AGAIN! When you play this character, you may return an action card from your discard to your hand.
flavor_text:
“If your chores are done, then clearly you don't
have enough of them.”

name: Lantern
text: BIRTHDAY LIGHTS {E} — You pay 1 {I} less for the next character you play this turn.
flavor_text:
Lanterns fill the sky on one special night, beacons of
hope and love.

name: LeFou
text: LOYAL If you have a character named Gaston in play, you pay 1 {I} less to play this character.
flavor_text: You need a good toady to be a proper bad guy.

name: LeFou
text: FAN THE FLAMES When you play this character, ready chosen character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.
flavor_text: All a mob needs is a push in the wrong direction.

name: Let It Go
text: (A character with cost 5 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.) Put chosen character into their player's inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavor_text:
It's time to see what I can do
to test the limits and break through

name: Lilo
flavor_text:
“Space. That's where aliens come from. And also
tourists!”

name: Lilo
flavor_text: “A falling star...I have to make a wish!”

name: Mad Hatter
text: TEA PARTY Whenever this character is challenged, you may draw a card.
flavor_text:
Mad Hatter: “Would you like a little more tea?”
Alice: “I haven't had any yet so I can't very well take
more.”

name: Magic Broom
text: SWEEP When you play this character, you may shuffle a card from any discard into its player's deck.
flavor_text:
In the immense story-forge known as the Great
Illuminary, there is always work to be done.

name: Magic Golden Flower
text: HEALING POLLEN Banish this item — Remove up to 3 damage from chosen character.
flavor_text:
“Once upon a time, a single drop of sunlight fell from
the heavens....”
—Flynn Rider

name: Magic Mirror
text: SPEAK! {E}, 4 {I} — Draw a card.
flavor_text: “What wouldst thou know, my Queen?”

name: Maleficent
flavor_text:
“One mustn't rush these things, or the greatest
plan might come to nothing.”

name: Maleficent
text: DRAGON FIRE When you play this character, you may banish chosen character.
flavor_text:
The ninth Rule of Villainy: When all else fails, turn
into a dragon.

name: Maleficent
flavor_text:
“The princess shall indeed grow in grace and beauty,
beloved by all who know her. But before the sun sets
on her sixteenth birthday, she shall prick her finger on
the spindle of a spinning wheel....”

name: Maleficent
text: CAST MY SPELL! When you play this character, you may draw a card.
flavor_text:
“You dare challenge me? Fool, my magic is more
powerful than you could possibly imagine!”

name: Maleficent
flavor_text:
She had no invitation—and needed no
introduction.

name: Marshmallow
text: DURABLE When this character is banished in a challenge, you may return this card to your hand.
flavor_text:
“Hey! We were just talking about you! All good
things, all good things.”
—Olaf

name: Maui
flavor_text:
When the gods gift you a boat, you take it. The boat's
owner is optional.

name: Maui
text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)
flavor_text: “What I believe you were trying to say is ‘Thank you.’”

name: Maurice
text:
GIVE IT A TRY Whenever this character quests, you pay 2 {I} less for the next item you play this turn.
IT WORKS! Whenever you play an item, you may draw a card.

name: Maximus
text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)

name: Maximus
text: HORSE KICK When you play this character, chosen character gets -2 {S} this turn.
flavor_text:
He pursues his quarry with courage, discipline,
and a touch of class.

name: Megara
text: WONDER BOY When you play this character, chosen character gets +2 {S} this turn.
flavor_text:
“A deal's a deal. But falling in love was never
supposed to be part of it.”

name: Merlin
text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
flavor_text:
“What a mess! What a medieval muddle! We'll
have to modernize it.”

name: Mickey Mouse
text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Mickey Mouse.)
MISDIRECTION Whenever you play an action, chosen opposing character can't quest during their next turn.
flavor_text: Quiet as a...well, you know.

name: Mickey Mouse
text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
flavor_text:
When defeat looms and victory hangs by a thread,
a hero bolts to the rescue, patching things up
through shear determination.

name: Mickey Mouse
text: GET A CLUE When you play this character, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavor_text:
Wherever the seaweed had come from, Mickey was
sure of one thing: something fishy was going on.

name: Mickey Mouse
text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
ALL FOR ONE Your other Musketeer characters get +1 {S}.

name: Mickey Mouse
flavor_text:
On rivers throughout the Inklands, the little
steamboat's whistle answers the cheery tunes of
its pilot.

name: Mickey Mouse
flavor_text:
As long as he's around, newcomers to the Great
Illuminary will always get a warm welcome.

name: Mickey Mouse
text:
ANIMATE BROOM You pay 1 {I} less to play Broom characters.
CEASELESS WORKER Whenever one of your Broom characters is banished in a challenge, you may return that card to your hand.
flavor_text: He always goes for the clean sweep.

name: Minnie Mouse
flavor_text: Her fashion sense is always spot on.

name: Minnie Mouse
flavor_text:
Wherever the princess goes, her musketeers are
...well, they're around somewhere, probably.

name: Moana
text: THIS IS NOT WHO YOU ARE When you play this character, you may banish chosen character named Te Kā.
flavor_text: “You know who you are.”

name: Moana
text: WE CAN FIX IT Whenever this character quests, you may ready your other Princess characters. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.
flavor_text:
“I am Moana of Motunui. You will board my boat, sail
across the sea, and restore the heart of Te Fiti.”

name: Mother Gothel
text: SKIP THE DRAMA, STAY WITH MAMA While this character is exerted, opposing characters can't quest.
flavor_text: “Great. Now I'm the bad guy.”

name: Mother Knows Best
text: (A character with cost 3 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.) Return chosen character to their player's hand.
flavor_text:
One way or another
Something will go wrong, I swear

name: Mr. Smee
flavor_text:
“Mr. Smee is a kind, gentle soul who lives to bring
comfort and aid to a twisted old villain. Now, what
good is kindness like that?”
—Peter Pan

name: Mufasa
flavor_text:
“A king must care for all of the creatures in his
kingdom, no matter their size.”

name: Mulan
text: LEAD BY EXAMPLE During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, your other characters get +1 {L} this turn.

name: Musketeer Tabard
text: ALL FOR ONE AND ONE FOR ALL Whenever one of your characters with Bodyguard is banished, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: There's no such thing as a lone musketeer.

name: Olaf
flavor_text: “I'm Olaf and I like warm hugs!”

name: One Jump Ahead
text: (A character with cost 2 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.) Put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavor_text:
Gotta eat to live, gotta steal to eat—
Tell you all about it when I got the time

name: Part of Your World
text: (A character with cost 3 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.) Return a character card from your discard to your hand.
flavor_text:
What would I give
If I could live out of these waters?

name: Pascal
text: CAMOUFLAGE While you have another character in play, this character gains Evasive. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)
flavor_text:
A true friend is always there for you, whether you can
see them or not.

name: Peter Pan
text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
flavor_text:
“Nobody calls Pan a coward and lives! I'll fight you
man-to-man, with one hand behind my back.”

name: Peter Pan
text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
flavor_text: “What's the matter, Hook? Can't you fly?”

name: Philoctetes
text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
flavor_text:
“Ya gotta be the best to train the best. And I train
the best!”

name: Plasma Blaster
text: QUICK SHOT {E}, 2 {I} — Deal 1 damage to chosen character.
flavor_text:
“You don't have to say ‘pew pew’ when you use it, but it
doesn't hurt.”
—Lilo, galactic hero

name: Poisoned Apple
text: TAKE A BITE... 1 {I}, Banish this item — Exert chosen character. If a Princess character is chosen, banish her instead.
flavor_text:
“One taste of the poisoned apple, and the victim's eyes
will close forever....”
—The Queen

name: Pongo
text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
flavor_text:
“At first I had no particular plan, just anything to
attract attention. You know, stir things up a bit.”

name: Prince Eric
text: Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2 {S}.)
flavor_text: “I lost her once! I'm not gonna lose her again!”

name: Prince Phillip
text: HEROISM When this character challenges and is banished, you may banish the challenged character.
flavor_text:
“The road to true love may be barred by still many more
dangers, which you alone will have to face.”
—Flora

name: Pumbaa
flavor_text: “You gotta put your behind in your past.”

name: Rafiki
text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
flavor_text:
“The past can hurt. But the way I see it, you can
either run from it or learn from it.”

name: Ransack
text: Draw 2 cards, then choose and discard 2 cards.
flavor_text: Who has time to read labels?

name: Rapunzel
text: GLEAM AND GLOW When you play this character, remove up to 3 damage from one of your characters. Draw a card for each 1 damage removed this way.

name: Rapunzel
text: TANGLE When you play this character, each opponent loses 1 lore.
flavor_text: “Who are you? And how did you find me?”

name: Reflection
text: (A character with cost 1 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.) Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Put them back on the top of your deck in any order.
flavor_text:
When will my reflection show
Who I am inside?

name: Robin Hood
text:
FEED THE POOR When you play this character, if an opponent has more cards in their hand than you, draw a card.
GOOD SHOT During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)
flavor_text:
“We never rob. We just sort of borrow a bit from those who
can afford it.”

name: Scar
flavor_text: Consumed by the flames of ambition.

name: Scar
text: INSIDIOUS PLOT When you play this character, chosen opposing character gets -5 {S} this turn.
flavor_text:
“The best plans involve a little danger. Just not
for me.”

name: Scar
text:
Shift 6 (You may pay 6 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Scar.)
ROUSING SPEECH When you play this character, ready your characters with cost 3 or less. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.
flavor_text: “The time has come to take what is ours!”

name: Scepter of Arendelle
text: COMMAND {E} — Chosen character gains Support this turn. (Whenever they quest, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)

name: Sebastian
text: Singer 4 (This character counts as cost 4 to sing songs.)
flavor_text:
“I should be writing symphonies, not tagging along after
some headstrong teenager.”

name: Sergeant Tibbs
flavor_text: “Yes, sir. Righto, sir. Right away, sir!”

name: Shield of Virtue
text: FIREPROOF {E}, 3 {I} — Ready chosen character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.
flavor_text:
“Arm thyself with this enchanted Shield of Virtue
and this mighty Sword of Truth, for these weapons of
righteousness will triumph over evil.” —Flora

name: Simba
text: GUESS WHAT? When you play this character, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.
flavor_text:
“I'm gonna be the best king the Pride Lands have
ever seen!”

name: Simba
text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
flavor_text: Courage comes in all sizes.

name: Simba
text:
Challenger +4 (While challenging, this character gets +4 {S}.)
POUNCE During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)
flavor_text: “I'll do whatever it takes to save my kingdom.”

name: Simba
text: I KNOW WHAT I HAVE TO DO During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you gain 1 lore.
flavor_text:
“I can't hide anymore. It's time to accept my
destiny.”

name: Smash
text: Deal 3 damage to chosen character.
flavor_text: “Go away!”

name: Stampede
text: Deal 2 damage to chosen damaged character.
flavor_text:
A wildebeest stampede is like a raging river: best
experienced from a distance.

name: Starkey
text: AYE AYE, CAPTAIN While you have a Captain character in play, this character gets +1 {L}.
flavor_text:
A pirate must be tough, loyal, and strong. “Smart”
doesn't even make the list.

name: Steal from the Rich
text: Whenever one of your characters quests this turn, each opponent loses 1 lore.
flavor_text:
“Wonder how much ol’ Prince John spent on all those
fancy locks.”
—Little John

name: Stitch
flavor_text:
“His destructive programming is taking effect. He will
be irresistibly drawn to large cities, where he will back
up sewers, reverse street signs, and steal everyone's
left shoe.”
—Jumba Jookiba

name: Stitch
text: OHANA When you play this character, if you have 2 or more other characters in play, you may draw 2 cards.
flavor_text:
“So you're from outer space, huh? I hear the surfing's
choice.”
—David

name: Stitch
flavor_text:
Lilo: “David! I got a new dog!”
David: “Auwe!...You sure it's a dog?”
Lilo: “Uh-huh. He used to be a collie before he got
ran over.”

name: Stitch
text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Stitch.)
ADORING FANS Whenever you play a character with cost 2 or less, you may exert them to draw a card.
flavor_text:
The best part about a beachside concert is that there's
always room for one more.

name: Stolen Scimitar
text: SLASH {E} — Chosen character gets +1 {S} this turn. If a character named Aladdin is chosen, he gets +2 {S} instead.
flavor_text: Sometimes you've got to take what you can get.

name: Sudden Chill
text: (A character with cost 2 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.) Each opponent chooses and discards a card.
flavor_text:
Cruella De Vil, Cruella De Vil
If she doesn't scare you, no evil thing will

name: Sven
flavor_text:
“Reindeer comin’ through!”
—Kristoff

name: Sword of Truth
text: FINAL ENCHANTMENT Banish this item — Banish chosen Villain character.
flavor_text: Almost as powerful as True Love's Kiss.

name: Tamatoa
flavor_text:
“Someday, I'll grow up to be the most crabulous
crustacean the world has ever seen!”

name: Tamatoa
text:
WHAT HAVE WE HERE? When you play this character and whenever he quests, you may return an item card from your discard to your hand.
GLAM This character gets +1 {L} for each item you have in play.
flavor_text: “Watch me dazzle like a diamond in the rough!”

name: Tangle
text: Each opponent loses 1 lore.
flavor_text:
“Stay right there! I mean, you don't have a choice, I
guess. But still! Don't move!”
—Rapunzel

name: Te Kā
text: SEEK THE HEART During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you gain 2 lore.
flavor_text:
Maui: “Ever defeat a lava monster?”
Moana: “No. Have you?”

name: Te Kā
text: Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)
flavor_text: She burns for that which was stolen from her.

name: The Beast is Mine!
text: Chosen character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)
flavor_text:
“It's only fitting that the finest hunter gets the foulest
beast!”
—Gaston

name: The Queen
text: I SUMMON THEE {E} — Draw a card.
flavor_text:
Sublime beauty matched with peerless cunning. Is
there any question who is fairest?

name: The Wardrobe
flavor_text: When you simply must have the hautest couture.

name: Tigger
text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
flavor_text: “I'm the bounciest bouncer that ever bounced!”

name: Timon
text: TASTES LIKE CHICKEN When you play this character, you may remove up to 1 damage from chosen character.
flavor_text:
“There's all manner of tasty treats in the world—ya
just gotta know where to look.”

name: Tinker Bell
text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Tinker Bell.)
ROCK THE BOAT When you play this character, deal 1 damage to each opposing character.
PUNY PIRATE! During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may deal 2 damage to chosen opposing character.

name: Tinker Bell
text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
PIXIE DUST When you play this character, chosen character gains Evasive this turn.

name: Tinker Bell
text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
LOYAL AND DEVOTED Your characters named Peter Pan gain Challenger +1. (They get +1 {S} while challenging.)

name: Tinker Bell
text: BATTLE PLANS {E} — Draw a card, then choose and discard a card.
flavor_text: Sometimes all you need is a little tactical genius.

name: Triton
flavor_text: “Isn't ‘Because I said so’ enough of a reason?”

name: Ursula
text: IT'S TOO EASY! When you play this character, each opponent loses 1 lore. You may draw a card for each 1 lore lost this way.
flavor_text:
The first Rule of Villainy: If you're going to be evil,
you've got to have style.

name: Ursula’s Cauldron
text: PEER INTO THE DEPTHS {E} — Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one on the top of your deck and the other on the bottom.
flavor_text: Perfect for mixing potions and stealing voices.

name: Ursula’s Shell Necklace
text: NOW, SING! Whenever you play a song, you may pay 1 {I} to draw a card.
flavor_text:
“Singing is a lovely pastime...if you've got the voice
for it.”
—Ursula

name: Vicious Betrayal
text: Chosen character gets +2 {S} this turn. If a Villain character is chosen, they get +3 {S} instead.
flavor_text:
“A true king takes matters into his own claws.”
—Scar

name: White Rabbit’s Pocket Watch
text: I'M LATE! {E}, 1 {I} — Chosen character gains Rush this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)
flavor_text:
“No wonder you're late. Why, this watch is exactly two
days slow.” —The Mad Hatter

name: Work Together
text: Chosen character gains Support this turn. (Whenever they quest, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
flavor_text:
Pacha: “Put your whole back into it!”
Kuzco: “This is my whole back!”

name: You Have Forgotten Me
text: Each opponent chooses and discards 2 cards.
flavor_text:
“You are more than what you have become.”
—Mufasa

name: Yzma
text: YOU'RE EXCUSED Whenever this character quests, look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.
flavor_text: “When I want your opinion, I will give it to you!”

name: Zeus
text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
Challenger +4 (While challenging, this character gets +4 {S}.)
flavor_text: “A little lightning solves a whole lot of problems.”
